title: How to Make a Safe Sex on the Beach Drink

steps.headline: Put a few ice cubes in a glass.
Pour the grapefruit, peach nectar, and cranberry juice into the glass.
Plop the cherry in the glass and serve with a straw.

text: Put a few ice cubes in a glass.  Pour the grapefruit, peach nectar, and cranberry juice into the glass.  Stir everything together.  Plop the cherry in the glass and serve with a straw.
